review: I have booked appointment for my father for cardiology related concern and we have visited the hospital. Doctor was very **** *** professional, he had done the check up and prescribed for few test to do after that he provided the medicines. We are 100% satisfied with doctor and there was bit wait time for us in hospital. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also.
The doctor is very busy.he is not getting enough time to deal patient.but his experience give the patient relief to some extent.

It's a totally worse experience, he is not cooperative, indecent behavior and ignored our patient's problem. He asked why Patient came to BM Birla for a silly problem, suggested to visit local doctors. Even he didn't go through previous medical history and diagnostic tests reports well. But reality is patient has too much high pressure with chest pain and with another problems. We know, a good doctor's Inspirational word can give the strength to fight from within, but in this case he plays opposite which make us displeased. ** *** ***** ** **** ** ** * ***** ***** *******
We had booked appointment for one-off my family members for cardiology concern and visited the hospital. Doctor was good and done the check up. We are overall satisfied with doctor and hospital.

I have  booked the appointment for my brother  and  it was  related to   his  heart . ********* *** *** **** ** *** ******* We would   like to suggest the doctor to our friend and family members in future . Medicines were prescribed by the doctor . *** ** ** ****** **** ********

I have taken appointment for my mother for cardiology surgery and we had visited the hospital. Doctor was very good and my mother surgery was successfully completed all this went good only, we are over all 90% satisfied with doctor treatment and I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members also

I visited the doctor for my heart issue the doctor suggested me to take TMT test so I have done that the test but yet to et my reports after I get my reports I should meet the doctor the doctor is very good at nature he was well behaved I had no issue at the hospital as well I am satisfied with the consultation
